explanation: This stage direction describes an elaborate sequence of actions involving multiple characters and includes a narrative element, as it lays out a scene where soldiers surround a character with their weapons and engage in a dance, while another character leads someone away. This detailed description fits well with the category `narration`, which is used for long stage directions with narrative quality intended for readers.
stgdir: Des soldats de la suite du Major entourent Roquillard, en lui présentant de tous côtés la pointe de la hallebarde ; et pendant ce temps Arlequin emmène Isabelle. Les soldats et Roquillard forment une danse, qui sert de divertissement pour le troisième acte.
